## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Implement layered architecture in a MERN application
2. Understand separation of concerns between layers
3. Apply frontend architecture patterns (presentational, container, layout components)
4. Manage state effectively with useState, useReducer, and Context
5. Present and receive feedback on project proposals
